alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:28PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Grady and east central Caddo Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Chickasha. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anadarko, Gracemont and Lake Chickasha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
